title: Manyu-Wana 3 (A)
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Aboriginal Australians - Language - Study and teaching

description: Episode number 3 of Series "Manyu-Wana (A)". This episode covers the following topics: Children playing; dampers magic-number 6; exercising for health, showing football and basketball matches between communitites; spear-throwing at Yuendumu Sports; reading of "The Story about the Snake and the Mouse"; words for 'heavy' and 'light'; colours; cleaning and grinding of bush seeds for seed cakes. Suitable for Primary, seconday and Tertiary level students. In Warlpiri language with Englsih subtitles.
